snippet: This will be an off-season of Mark Sanchez speculation -- how to fix him, whether to move on. But there are so many other concerns.
abstract: This will be an off-season of Mark Sanchez speculation -- how to fix him, whether to move on. But there are so many other concerns.
lead_paragraph: The Jets would have missed the playoffs anyway -- Tennessee defeated Houston -- but the way they went out on Sunday had to be demoralizing for Jets fans.

headline.main: What Are Jets' Biggest Off-Season Needs?
